price: Maka tunggulah hari ketika langit membawa kabut yang nyata 1372,
arabic: فَٱرۡتَقِبۡ يَوۡمَ تَأۡتِي ٱلسَّمَآءُ بِدُخَانٖ مُّبِينٖ
footnotes: 1372.  Maksud kabut yang nyata ialah bencana kelaparan yang menimpa kaum Quraisy karena mereka menentang Nabi Muhammad Ṣallallāhu ʻAlaihi wa Sallam.

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: fa-ir'taqib yawma tatī al-samāu bidukhānin mubīnin
